quest.name: Witch of the Sea
journal:
 Quest Sync
The forthright farmer has a mystery to share.
objectives: Investigate the cliffs around the Clave.

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir! You seem the well-traveled sort. Would you be willing to accompany me to the Clave in return for a reward?

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: There's a bit of a problem, see. We take turns manning the watchtowers hereabouts, but the last few folk have been driven away from the lighthouse post by sudden and terrible headaches.

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: Every single one of them remembers hearing some sort of “screeching wail.” We don't know if we're dealing with a sea witch or a roaming banshee, but they all agree the sound is awful enough to chill your blood!

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: How fortunate for me, then, that I have you to back me up! Pray follow me to the Clave, and we can solve this mystery together...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: Maybe we should split up and have more of a look around. Once you're satisfied there's naught to find, you can meet me back here at the lighthouse.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You think you hear a faint noise...but maybe you imagined it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The waters here swell and crash with cacophonous violence, rivaling the stormy seas of La Noscea...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You hear nothing but the lapping of the waves...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: I heard it...that terrible voice! Aaargh! The pain! I can feel my head...splitting in half...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can soothe him with a few calming words...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text:
I... I think I might live, thank you...
That keening din seemed to pierce my very skull...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: I've never heard the likes of it. If there truly exists a sea witch who murders sailors with her cursed screams, then that is how I imagine her voice would sound.

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: At least now we know which areas are too dangerous to approach. Come, we must return to Wright so I can share this with the others.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can soothe him with a few calming words...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can soothe him with a few calming words...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: Now that I've had a chance to calm down, I feel a little embarrassed by my earlier behavior. I think stories of sea witches and the like may have fed my panic...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: But not everyone puts stock in those old tales, it seems. There was talk of a girl from Gatetown who's taken to visiting the lighthouse to practice her sing─ Wait... You don't think that awful keening could have been...? No, surely not...

dialogue.name: SERIOUSMAN03356
dialogue.text: Ahaha...hahaha. Ahem. Thank you for standing by me during that terrifying ordeal. And be wary of wailing sea witches should you find yourself near the Clave again!
